definitions: a person to whom a job or role is assigned

examples.text: an appointee to to the federal judiciary
the Commission calls for a reduction in the number of political appointees

shortDefinitions: person to whom job or role is assigned

definitions: a person empowered by the owner of property to decide the disposition of that property

examples.text: an appointee will arrange to receive your state benefits and pay your bills

shortDefinitions: person empowered by owner of property to decide its disposition
